Package com.easylease.easylease.control.utility

Class EmailManager

java.lang.Object
com.easylease.easylease.control.utility.EmailManager
public class EmailManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the methods for sending mails to clients.

    • sendOrderNotification

      public static boolean sendOrderNotification​(Client client, Order order) throws javax.mail.MessagingException
      Method to send an E-mail to a customer when his order is validated.
      Parameters:
      client - Client to send the E-mail to.
      order - Order that has been validated.
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if there are problems creating the message.

      0.1
